key_ingredients.name: Salicylic Acid
key_ingredients.description: An oil-soluble exfoliant that penetrates into the pores to dissolve oil and dead skin cells, effectively treating blackheads and reducing pore congestion.

key_ingredients.name: Ascorbyl Glucoside
key_ingredients.description: A stable form of Vitamin C that acts as an antioxidant, brightens the skin, and helps to fade the appearance of sun spots and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation.

key_ingredients.name: Hyaluronic Acid
key_ingredients.description: A powerful humectant that draws moisture into the skin, helping to keep it hydrated, plump, and healthy. Well-hydrated skin can improve the appearance of fine lines and overall texture.

key_ingredients.name: Ceramide EOP
key_ingredients.description: Essential lipids that help form the skin's barrier and retain moisture. A strong barrier is crucial for healthy skin, especially when using active ingredients.

products.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
products.rationale: This gentle, hydrating cleanser effectively removes impurities without stripping the skin. Its hyaluronic acid complex ensures your combination skin starts the day hydrated and balanced, not tight or dry.

am.instructions:
1. Apply a small amount of cleanser to damp skin.
2. Gently massage in circular motions for 60 seconds, focusing on the t-zone.
3. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry.

products.name: Azelaic Acid 10 Hyaluron Redness Soothing Serum
products.rationale: This serum is chosen to target your pigmentation concerns. Azelaic Acid is effective at fading post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation and sun spots while also helping to calm the skin. This formulation is gentle enough for morning use.

am.instructions:
1. After cleansing, apply 2-3 drops of serum to your face.
2. Gently pat it into the skin until fully absorbed, avoiding the immediate eye area.
3. This can be used daily in the morning.

products.name: Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream
products.rationale: To address under-eye darkness, this cream combines niacinamide to brighten the skin and a peptide complex to support skin health. Snail filtrate provides hydration to plump the area, potentially reducing the appearance of vascular darkness.

am.instructions:
1. Dispense a small dot of eye cream onto your ring finger.
2. Gently tap it around the orbital bone (the bone around your eye), avoiding pulling on the delicate skin.
3. Use daily in the morning.

products.name: Aqua Squalane Moisturizing Cream
products.rationale: This lightweight moisturizer provides balanced hydration for your combination skin without feeling heavy. Squalane helps to moisturize and support the skin barrier, while various forms of hyaluronic acid plump the skin.

am.instructions:
1. Apply a dime-sized amount of cream to your face as the final step before sunscreen.
2. Gently massage it in until absorbed.

products.name: Essence Light Sunscreen SPF 50
products.rationale: Sun protection is crucial for preventing your pigmentation from worsening. This lightweight SPF 50 provides essential broad-spectrum protection without feeling greasy, making it ideal for daily use on combination skin.

am.instructions:
1. Apply a generous amount to your face and neck as the last step of your morning routine. A good measure is the length of two fingers.
2. Reapply every 2-3 hours if you are in direct sun.

products.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
products.rationale: Using the same gentle cleanser from the morning ensures your skin is thoroughly cleansed of sunscreen and daily grime without disrupting your skin barrier.

pm.instructions:
1. Apply a small amount of cleanser to damp skin.
2. Gently massage in circular motions for 60 seconds.
3. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water and pat dry.

products.name: Madagascar Centella Hyalu-Cica Brightening Toner
products.rationale: This toner is selected to gently address clogged pores. It contains Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, a derivative of salicylic acid, which exfoliates within the pore to help clear blackheads. The formula also includes hydrating and calming ingredients to balance the skin.

pm.instructions:
1. After cleansing, dispense the toner onto a cotton pad or into your palms.
2. Gently sweep or pat across your face, focusing on the T-zone where pores are most visible.
3. Allow it to absorb before the next step. Can be used daily.

products.name: Black Rice Bakuchiol Eye Cream
products.rationale: This evening eye cream targets under-eye concerns with Bakuchiol, a gentle plant-based alternative to retinol, which can help with skin texture and pigmentation over time. Niacinamide also helps to brighten the area.

pm.instructions:
1. Dispense a small dot of eye cream onto your ring finger.
2. Gently tap it around the orbital bone.
3. Use nightly.

products.name: Pore+dark Spot Brightening Cream
products.rationale: This moisturizer directly targets your key concerns of pores and pigmentation. It contains Niacinamide and Tranexamic Acid, two powerful ingredients known for their ability to brighten dark spots and improve the appearance of pores, making it an excellent treatment for your night routine.

pm.instructions:
1. Apply a pea-sized amount to your face as the final step of your evening routine.
2. Gently massage into the skin until absorbed.

products.name: Retinol 0.2 Boosting Shot Ampoule
products.rationale: This retinol ampoule is a powerful weekly treatment to accelerate skin cell turnover. This will help improve the appearance of pores, fade pigmentation, and smooth skin texture over time. It is introduced as a weekly step to allow your skin to acclimate.

weekly.instructions:
1. On clean, dry skin in the evening, apply 2-3 drops of the ampoule, avoiding the eye and mouth area.
2. Follow with your moisturizer after it has fully absorbed.
3. Start by using this ONLY ONCE a week. If your skin tolerates it well after a few weeks, you may increase to twice a week. Do not use on the same night as other strong exfoliants.

general_advice: Sunscreen is your best tool against pigmentation. Apply it every morning, even on cloudy days, to prevent existing spots from darkening and new ones from forming.
Introduce new active ingredients slowly. Start with the weekly retinol treatment just once a week for the first two weeks to ensure your skin adapts without irritation.
Be patient and consistent with your routine. It can take 2-3 months of consistent use to see noticeable improvements in pigmentation and pore appearance.
Avoid squeezing or picking at clogged pores. This can lead to inflammation and worsen post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. Let the ingredients in your routine do the work.
